11.name: Frozen
11.description: When the newly-crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

30.name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
30.description: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

31.name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
31.description: An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.

32.name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
32.description: It's Harry's third year at Hogwarts; not only does he have a new "Defense Against the Dark Arts" teacher, but there is also trouble brewing. Convicted murderer Sirius Black has escaped the Wizards' Prison and is coming after Harry.

33.name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
33.description: A young wizard finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

34.name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
34.description: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

35.name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
35.description: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.

36.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part I
36.description: As Harry races against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, he uncovers the existence of three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

37.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
37.description: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

38.name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
38.description: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

10.name: Moana
10.description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

12.name: Frozen Fever
12.description: On Anna's birthday, Elsa and Kristoff are determined to give her the best celebration ever, but Elsa's icy powers may put more than just the party at risk.

13.name: The Princess and the Frog
13.description: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

14.name: Beauty and the Beast
14.description: A selfish prince is cursed to become a monster for the rest of his life, unless he learns to fall in love with a beautiful young woman he keeps prisoner.

22.name: Inside Out
22.description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

23.name: Big Hero 6
23.description:
The special bond that develops between plus-sized inflatable robot 
Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

24.name: Coco
24.description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

25.name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
25.description: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know, that things are about to take a turn for the worst.

26.name: Wreck-It Ralph
26.description: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

27.name: The Incredibles
27.description: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

28.name: Incredibles 2
28.description: The Incredibles hero family takes on a new mission, which involves a change in family roles: Bob Parr (Mr Incredible) must manage the house while his wife Helen (Elastigirl) goes out to save the world.

29.name: How to Train Your Dragon
29.description: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

210.name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
210.description: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

20.name: Finding Nemo
20.description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

21.name: Finding Dory
21.description: The friendly but forgetful blue tang fish, Dory, begins a search for her long-lost parents, and everyone learns a few things about the real meaning of family along the way.

211.name: Monsters University
211.description: A look at the relationship between Mike and Sulley during their days at Monsters University -- when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.

212.name: Monsters, Inc.
212.description: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, 2 monsters realize things may not be what they think.

213.name: Zootopia
213.description: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

214.name: The Good Dinosaur
214.description: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side-by-side, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend.

215.name: The Croods
215.description: After their cave is destroyed, a caveman family must trek through an unfamiliar fantastical world with the help of an inventive boy.

216.name: Rise of the Guardians
216.description: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.

217.name: Rango
217.description: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.
Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.

47.name: The Avengers
47.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

48.name: Iron Man 3
48.description:
When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he 
starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

49.name: Thor: The Dark World
49.description: When Dr. Jane Foster gets cursed with a powerful entity known as the Aether, Thor is heralded of the cosmic event known as the Convergence and the genocidal Dark Elves.

410.name: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
410.description: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

411.name: Guardians of the Galaxy
411.description: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

412.name: Avengers: Age of Ultron
412.description: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.

413.name: Ant-Man
413.description: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.

414.name: Captain America: Civil War
414.description: Political involvement in the Avengers' activities causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

415.name: Doctor Strange
415.description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

416.name: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
416.description: The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mystery of Peter Quill's true parentage.

417.name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
417.description: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

418.name: Thor: Ragnarok
418.description: Thor is imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, and must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

419.name: Black Panther
419.description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.

420.name: Avengers: Infinity War
420.description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

421.name: Ant-Man and the Wasp
421.description: As Scott Lang balances being both a Super Hero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.

50.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
50.description: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

51.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
51.description: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.

52.name:
Pirates of the Caribbean: At 
World's End
52.description: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must sail off the edge of the map, navigate treachery and betrayal, find Jack Sparrow, and make their final alliances for one last decisive battle.

53.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
53.description: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.

54.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
54.description: Captain Jack Sparrow searches for the trident of Poseidon while being pursued by an undead sea captain and his crew.

55.name: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
55.description: A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home, and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.

56.name: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
56.description: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.

57.name: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
57.description: Bilbo and company are forced to engage in a war against an array of combatants and keep the Lonely Mountain from falling into the hands of a rising darkness.

58.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
58.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

59.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
59.description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

510.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
510.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

70.name: Blade Runner 2049
70.description: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

71.name: The Matrix
71.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

72.name: The Matrix Reloaded
72.description: Following the events of The Matrix, Neo and the rebel leaders estimate they have 72 hours until 250,000 probes discover Zion and destroy it and its inhabitants. Neo must decide how he can save Trinity from a dark fate in his dreams.

73.name: The Matrix Revolutions
73.description: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

74.name: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
74.description: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives advanced intelligence to a chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

75.name: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
75.description: A growing nation of genetically evolved apes led by Caesar is threatened by a band of human survivors of the devastating virus unleashed a decade earlier.

76.name: War for the Planet of the Apes
76.description: After the apes suffer unimaginable losses, Caesar wrestles with his darker instincts and begins his own mythic quest to avenge his kind.

60.name: Raiders of the Lost Ark
60.description:
In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome 
powers.

61.name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
61.description: In 1935, Indiana Jones arrives in India, still part of the British Empire, and is asked to find a mystical stone. He then stumbles upon a secret cult committing enslavement and human sacrifices in the catacombs of an ancient palace.

62.name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
62.description: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them obtaining its powers.

63.name: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
63.description: In 1957, archaeologist and adventurer Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. is called back into action and becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

64.name: Gladiator
64.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
